description: Anzu is one of Yugi`s classmates and childhood friend. Unlike many of the others, she`s always concerned that Yugi will get himself into trouble. She tries her best to stay by his side, but Yugi tends to wander away from her. Anzu is one of the first to learn about Yugi`s secret. Unlike Yugi her dueling skills are to be questionable.
name: Mazaki Anzu
